mapper.select: SELECT gr.game_record_code, g.game_code, g.member_code, m.name, c.member_code as challenger_code, cm.name as challenger_name, gr.winner_code, gr.loser_code, gr.draw, g.clock FROM game g JOIN challenger c ON g.game_code=#{game_code} AND c.state=1 AND g.game_code = c.game_code JOIN member m ON g.member_code = m.member_code JOIN member cm ON c.member_code = cm.member_code JOIN game_record gr ON g.game_code = gr.game_code
mapper.update: update member set record = record + 1, win = win + 1, score = score + 10 where member_code = #{member_code}
update member set record = record + 1, lose = lose + 1, score = score - 3 where member_code = #{challenger_code}
update member set record = record + 1, win = win + 1, score = score + 10 where member_code = #{challenger_code}
update member set record = record + 1, lose = lose + 1, score = score - 3 where member_code = #{member_code}
update member set record = record + 1, draw = draw + 1 where member_code = #{member_code} or member_code = #{challenger_code}
mapper.insert: insert into game_record values(GAME_RECORD_CODE_SEQ.nextval, #{game_code}, #{challenger_code}, #{member_code}, null, null, 1)
